item.title: Return of the Meme: 1543 (stoic crow)
item.description:
Let's get this bread.
Byzantine Dromon, obviously.
The cycle of Simon Bolivar
*loud cheers*
Helicopteron, the whorl-tooth shark.
Yeaaaaaaah.
In other words, it's a Paradox game.
Pippin tax! Today's message from Pippin: "Pippin! I love you." We now have a discord! https://discord.gg/K9Aj5mdV ______ 1) Are you on the run to a safe place and passing through Arizona on your way to safer grounds? My apartment is open to you to crash at, and it is a safe space. Pippin and I will make you a meal and gladly share tea, wine, or mead with you. 2) Hey! Take your meds with a full glass of water, please. Do it for Pippin, or Space Mom, or better yet, do it for yourself. 3) Ĝefeloað wē. We will carry on. 4) all funds from the sales of items at these two links will be sent to support charities aiding to fight for Trans rights in the US (not just T-shirts!) https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74812801-all-conures-are-anarchists https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74811778-whiptail-pride 5) Since multiple people have requested this over the last two weeks or so, my ko-fi is: https://ko-fi.com/codyandpippin

item.title: TheVaal-U Dump #194 Justice #1

1. Emiliano Zapata. https://www.mexicohistorico.com/paginas/The-Legacy-of-Emiliano-Zapata-in-Mexican-History.html https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emiliano_Zapata
2. Edward Abbey. https://jan.ucc.nau.edu/kgk/UC101/Abbey.htm https://glencanyon.org/glen-canyon-legends/edward-abbey/ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edward_Abbey

6. Inequality. https://inequality.org/facts/global-inequality/ Equality. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Equality Equity. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Equity Most of the links that came up for ‘Equity’ in DDG, were for financial equity… Justice. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Justice
7. https://www.greenpeace.org/international/act/climate-justice/ https://centerclimatejustice.universityofcalifornia.edu/what-is-climate-justice/ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Climate_justice
8. Equal Justice. https://eji.org/ https://humanrights.ca/ https://humanrights.ca/story/black-lives-matter-and-struggle-racial-justice-canada
9.
10.
11.
12. Mary Elizabeth Lease. https://historymatters.gmu.edu/d/5303/ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Elizabeth_Lease
13. This is a great line. Something that stirs our sense of justice for all. But… No, Ben Franklin did not say that. This quote has been circulating online for years, often attributed to Ben Franklin. However, according to the Snopes Archives, there is no evidence that Franklin ever said or wrote this. The quote is actually a modern-day creation, often used in social media posts and inspirational contexts. - Snopes.com https://www.snopes.com/factbot/?query=did+ben+franklin+say+%22Justice+will+not+be+served+until+those+unaffected+are+as+outraged+as+those+who+are%22 It’s still a great line!
14. GNU Terry Pratchett.
15.
16. Dr Martin Luther King, Jr. https://thekingcenter.org/about-tkc/martin-luther-king-jr/ https://kinginstitute.stanford.edu/introduction https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Martin_Luther_King_Jr.
17.
18.
19.

21.

item.title: GovBrief Today #307
item.description: "When you get an order, you move out fast and don't ask questions." That's what Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth told a retiring four-star admiral concerned about the legality of killing people in boat attacks, even though the command's top lawyer shared his concerns. Now a different admiral who gave the order has been summoned to Capitol Hill tomorrow amid bipartisan furor over what is being called a potential war crime. At the FDA, the top drug regulator quit after only three weeks, saying the plans to bypass career scientists may be illegal. Today, twelve former commissioners published a joint rebuke calling the agency's claims a misrepresentation of science. Tomorrow, a vaccine advisory committee Kennedy packed with loyalists meets to vote on changing the childhood immunization schedule. The new chair is an anti-mRNA vaccine critic with no policy background. Congress is moving on the boat strikes. Make sure they move on vaccines too. Call your senators and representative today on both. Want to stop missing what matters? Get every GovBrief in your inbox, 7 nights a week. You'll get data, images, quotes, and links to help you get engaged. Sign up at govbrief.today or on Substack. #GovBriefToday #Resist Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com [1] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-more-somali-criticism [2] https://go.govbrief.today/nigeria-christian-visa-ban [3] https://go.govbrief.today/illinois-vaccine-guidelines [4] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-fuel-standards-rollback [5] https://go.govbrief.today/fed-president-veto [6] https://go.govbrief.today/hegseth-holsey-resignation [7] https://go.govbrief.today/survivors-known-boat-attack [8] https://go.govbrief.today/hegseth-pentagon-breach [9] https://go.govbrief.today/james-sarcone-dispute [10] https://go.govbrief.today/minnesota-new-orleans [11] https://go.govbrief.today/adm-bradley-congress [12] https://go.govbrief.today/smith-house-deposition [13] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-cuellar-pardon [14] https://go.govbrief.today/epa-workers-fired-dissent [15] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-leiweke-pardon [16] https://go.govbrief.today/us-peace-renamed-trump [17] https://go.govbrief.today/gentile-no-restitution [18] https://go.govbrief.today/fda-experts-criticism Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com

item.title: The Onion has officially made the jump to real news
item.description: https://theonion.com/utah-bans-eye-contact-during-sex/ SALT LAKE CITY—With top lawmakers championing the measure as a restoration of Christian values currently under attack in mainstream America, the Utah State Legislature passed a bill Monday that bans all eye contact during sex. “Looking directly into another person’s eyes while being physically intimate is a sick and unholy act,” said Utah Gov. Spencer Cox, who criticized the “perversion” of locking eyes during sex and argued that it had led directly to rising rates of crime and drug abuse. “This is a Christian state, and emotionless sex is a part of our heritage worth preserving. The only eyes you should be staring into during sex are Christ’s. Maintaining a deep, mutual gaze with a lover is an immoral and repulsive practice that corrupts our traditional method of procreation. They may accept this kind of degeneracy in California, but in Utah, we close our eyes and get it over with as the Lord intended. If your spouse tries to run their hands through your hair and look you in the eye while having sex, we recommend averting your gaze, saying a silent prayer, and contacting the authorities immediately.” Addressing the concerns of Utah residents worried they might, in a moment of weakness, succumb to the temptation of intimate eye contact, Gov. Cox recommended “hitting it from the back.” I assumed this was something on brand for Utah until I realized it was The Onion.
item.dc:creator: DownvotesStarWars

item.title: Warhammer 40k - Beastmen comics & memes
item.description: Still looking for more? Follow the links to a list of other posts so far: (A-H): https://imgur.com/a/looking-more-just-scroll-down-h-Ax6a1jG (I-P): https://imgur.com/a/looking-more-just-scroll-down-i-p-bkN1PH4 (Q-Z): https://imgur.com/a/looking-more-just-scroll-down-q-z-UPVRVVF And now I even started posting Age of Sigmar comics & memes: https://imgur.com/a/looking-more-aos-scroll-down-2pwprn2 Do you have a suggestion for another 40k group/faction/individual that you'd like to see that isn't on the list? Leave a suggestion. One per person, please. Explanation: Beastmen (Homo sapiens variatus) are bestial abhumans combining the forms of animal and human. They are considered to be fairly genetically stable compared to those afflicted by more random, unpredictable mutations. The so-called ‘beastmen’ are known to have first appeared during the Age of Strife. Most common among the mutant and abhuman strains that arose during those times, these human kine have stable beastlike mutations and are prized for their perceived prowess at war. Fun Fact: Beastmen are seen less in Imperial service than they were before. They are now subject to severe Imperial persecution and have been placed on the Register of Proscribed Citizens (Class A-G worlds) by the Adeptus Arbites. As such, they are effectively precluded from settlement on, or transportation to or from, more than three hundred thousand worlds of the Imperium and are forbidden from being conscripted as an Imperial Tithe obligation.
item.dc:creator: LincLoud
